name: spo-list-items-with-caml-query
title: Get SharePoint List Items Using CAML Queries With Different Field Types.
shortDescription: This script sample shows how to get SharePoint list items using CAML query with different types of fields
longDescription: This sample read SharePoint list items using CAML query with different types of fields like Text, Date, Choice, Lookup, User, and some advanced concepts like BeginsWith and Contains.
